section_title:
11a08 - Airline passengers
and goods - ground transportation.
text:
Employees engaged in
transporting passengers and freight to and from an airport in connection with
interstate trips are engaged in interstate commerce, although all the
operations of the transit service may be wholly within the borders of the
State.
html: Employees engaged in transporting passengers and freight to and from an airport in connection with interstate trips are engaged in interstate commerce, although all the operations of the transit service may be wholly within the borders of the State.
